item.title: Wealth inequality and the 'K-shaped' economy are more striking than ever, data shows
item.description: The K-shaped economy is as apparent as ever and isn't going away anytime soon, economists say.

item.title: Trump to announce Fed chair nominee Friday; Kevin Warsh may be his pick, according to reports
item.description: President Donald Trump said Thursday that he will be naming his pick Friday for the new Federal Reserve chair.

item.title: Scenic trains, cruises and concerts: China’s new plan to get consumers spending again

item.title: Trade deficit soared 94% in November and was higher than a year ago, despite tariff efforts
item.description: The U.S. deficit with its global trading partners nearly doubled in November as the shortfall with the European Union swelled.

item.title: China and the UK are attempting to reset their relationship — here's how
